title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 670.7 - Form and content of records and appendices; exhibits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 670.7 - Form and content of records and appendices; exhibits

State Regulations
(a) Supplemental record. A supplemental record shall only be accepted for
filing in the following circumstances: (1)
where directed or permitted by order of
the court; or
(2)
where accompanied
by a stipulation in which it is agreed that the contents of the supplemental
record are properly part of the record on appeal as that term is defined in
CPLR 5526 and section
1250.7
(b) of the

Practice Rules of the Appellate Division (22 NYCRR section
1250.7
[b]
) but
were inadvertently omitted from the record on appeal previously filed with the
court. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
670.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
